price: Ọ̀rọ̀ Wa fún kiní kan nígbà tí A bá gbèrò rẹ̀ ni pé, A máa sọ fún un pé: “Jẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀.” Ó sì máa jẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀.”
arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā qawlunā lishayin idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
